name: Shadows of the past
description:
Shadows of the past is a visual novel for adults only. In a small town, private detective Josh Wilson leads a quiet and measured life, solving small problems for the locals. But everything changes when Ellie shows up on his office doorstep....

Wrapped up in the investigation, Josh realizes that the small town harbors dark secrets, and the shadows of the past persistently haunt him at every turn. The local police seem adept at covering up the mysterious crimes. But can they stop Josh and Ellie's determination to uncover the truth?
Immerse yourself in a deep and tense investigation where every choice can change the fate of the heroes. The trembling relationship between Josh and Ellie will add a sweet touch to this dark story.

Features:

Intriguing plot with many unexpected twists and turns.
Developed characters with deep characters and motivations.
A romantic line between the main characters.
Atmospheric illustrations and accompanying soundtrack.
